section.p:
StudDB main window
StudDB main window
Окно состоит из следующих областей:
Main menu (see ), contains most of the StudDB command.
Toolbar (see ) for quick access to most often used functions.
Tree view panel (see ) provides an overview of the school structure.
General view panel. This is the panel that displays and allows editing of student profiles and school subdivisions.
Status bar (see ).
